channel.title: I don't even know what to title
channel.description:
I see our community has plenty of experience in the website design scene, maybe it will be cool if one of our members release a one page layout like this one:
http://promo.leagueoflegends.com/en/freljord/index.html
If you guys can't be bothered creating something like that, maybe you guys can post a tutorial on how to do any basic but effective web design :o
I might sound like an ass, if I do tell me up front.

item.title: I don't even know what to title
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:10, topic:518548”]Reminds me of this:

http://www.reecematthews.co.uk/downloads/preview/slide.php[/quote]That’s poorly designed, the coding behind it may be good, but the over all look was not thought through.

Read full topic

item.title: I don't even know what to title
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Lol, don’t rip, i suggest first learning some basic html etc and then downloading one of revengepk’s or 3lv3n’s templates and work with those to improve, sooner or later u will be able to create your own websites

Read full topic
item.source: I don't even know what to title

item.title: I don't even know what to title
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“RevengePK, post:7, topic:518548”]I’ve been experimenting with moving backgrounds etc. This is right up my alley. I’ll give it a shot. :D[/quote]Good Luck with it, interested in seeing what you can produce.

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:518548”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=636813.msg4293302#msg4293302 date=1367745119]
If you guys can’t be bothered creating something like that, maybe you guys can post a tutorial on how to do any basic but effective web design :o
[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Everyone seems to like it and it’s been used on several communities so give it a read.[/quote]I’ll check it out in a bit, thanks for referring me

Read full topic
